schedule.description: Create an event at the specified date and time.

behavior.No time specified: Show message asking for a date.
behavior.Specified time is not available: Search remaning specified days. If none remain, show message saying schedule is busy.

time.description: A period in time, in 24h format. Created from one or more times.
considerations: If only one hour is specified, assume 1 hour period. Ex: 12 -> 12:00-13:00
If no minutes are specified, assume from the hour o'clock. Ex: 12-13 -> 12:00-13:00
Hours must be between 0-23, and minutes should be between 0-59.
Hour on the left must be lower than hour on the right. No day overflow on events.
